      • tick

        public void tick(Location aLocation)
        Description copied from class: Item
        Inform an Item on the ground of the passage of time. This method is called once per turn, if the item rests upon the ground.
        Overrides:
        tick in class Item
        Parameters:
        aLocation - The location of the ground on which we lie.
